FAQ

Placing Your Order

How long will it take to receive my order?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, Bank Wire Transfer, Certified Cheque, e-transfer*, and Affirm Monthly Payments* (*USA Only). Personal cheques are not accepted. Please do not mail personal cheques as payment.

We are not accepting deposits. All orders need to be paid in full at the time of purchase. We require full payment so that we can lock in the best current market and delivery price for you. If paying by credit card, your card will be charged immediately for the full order amount at the time of purchase.

Will I be contacted by Woodland Mills after I place my order?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, Bank Wire Transfer, Certified Cheque, e-transfer*, and Affirm Monthly Payments* (*USA Only). Personal cheques are not accepted. Please do not mail personal cheques as payment.

We are not accepting deposits. All orders need to be paid in full at the time of purchase. We require full payment so that we can lock in the best current market and delivery price for you. If paying by credit card, your card will be charged immediately for the full order amount at the time of purchase.

Can Woodland Mills ship to a PO Box?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, Bank Wire Transfer, Certified Cheque, e-transfer*, and Affirm Monthly Payments* (*USA Only). Personal cheques are not accepted. Please do not mail personal cheques as payment.

We are not accepting deposits. All orders need to be paid in full at the time of purchase. We require full payment so that we can lock in the best current market and delivery price for you. If paying by credit card, your card will be charged immediately for the full order amount at the time of purchase.
